Description_lang: Judgment causes the next $196941N successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for $183811s1. $@switch<$s2>[][This effect can only occur once every $s1 sec on each target.]

description_blz.en_US: Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 952.
description_blz.es_MX: Sentencia hace que los siguientes 5 ataques exitosos contra el objetivo sanen al atacante por 951 p.
description_blz.pt_BR: Julgamento faz com que os próximos 5 ataques bem-sucedidos contra o alvo curem 954 pontos de vida do agressor.
description_blz.de_DE: Durch 'Richturteil' heilen die nächsten 5 erfolgreichen Angriffe auf das Ziel den Angreifer um 949 Gesundheit.
description_blz.en_GB: Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 981.
description_blz.es_ES: Sentencia provoca que los 5 siguientes ataques con éxito contra el objetivo sanen 954 p. al atacante.
description_blz.fr_FR: Jugement permet aux 5 prochaines attaques réussies contre la cible de rendre 960 points de vie à l’attaquant.
description_blz.it_IT: Giudizio fa sì che i successivi 5 attacchi a segno sul bersaglio curino chi lo attacca di 977.
description_blz.ru_RU: 5 удачных атак против цели, пораженной "Правосудием", восполняют атакующему 965 ед. здоровья.
description_blz.ko_KR: 심판 사용 시 다음 5회 동안 대상에게 공격을 적중시키는 공격자는 생명력을 972만큼 회복합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 審判會讓下5次對目標的成功攻擊為攻擊者恢復983點生命力。
description_blz.zh_CN: 审判现在会使接下来5次成功命中目标的攻击为攻击者治疗978点生命。
